meanings.definition: A collection of shrubs or small bushes planted together.
meanings.sent1: The colorful shrubbery brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: The landscaper carefully arranged the shrubbery around the house.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid nuts in the shrubbery, thinking no one would find them.
meanings.sent4: The dense shrubbery formed a natural barrier between the properties.
meanings.sent5: The fragrant shrubbery filled the air with a sweet scent.

meanings.definition: A decorative garden feature made up of shrubs.
meanings.sent1: The elegant shrubbery added charm to the backyard.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the intricate design of the shrubbery in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play hide-and-seek in the shrubbery.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the shrubbery resembled a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The well-maintained shrubbery enhanced the overall look of the garden.

meanings.sent1: The dense shrubbery provided shelter for small animals.
meanings.sent2: The gardener trimmed the shrubbery to keep it neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The curious child explored the shrubbery, looking for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The lush green shrubbery contrasted with the colorful flowers nearby.
meanings.sent5: The overgrown shrubbery created a mysterious atmosphere in the yard.
